title: FPS
body: Hey guys, i've been playing League of Legends for 3 years, my FPS has always been very high, never had any lag spikes, but after i restarded my pc a few times in a row (my screen wouldn't work i had to restart my pc a few times) my FPS has become very low, i usually had 150+ FPS but it's under 60 now, how can i get higher FPS again?

replies.body: Check for any possible DirectX or graphics driver updates you might have missed, but I'd also check to see if you have the Windows Game DVR Bar turned on and if so turn it off. Those Windows updates will normally turn it back on, and its been known to cause fps issues for League here and there.
